info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 55792
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 55792
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21694
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21694
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1;p=quarantine;aspf=s;rua=mailto:tech@mesads.beta.gouv.fr;ruf=mailto:tech@mesads.beta.gouv.fr"

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24146
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24146
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 2023010901 3600 900 1209600 300

info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49978
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49978
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"sendinblue-code:35825ab866ee17a8afb7cc52439cbc0b"
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.sendinblue.com include:_spf.alwaysdata.com mx -all"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49978
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49978
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"sendinblue-code:35825ab866ee17a8afb7cc52439cbc0b"
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.sendinblue.com include:_spf.alwaysdata.com mx -all"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 65527
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 65527
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
mesads.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mesads.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Content-Length: 2087 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Referrer-Policy: same-origin Sozu-Id: 01JW3A1VZ7KRX705ZFJC27R5G6 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY 403 Forbidden

Interdit (403)

La v√©rification CSRF a √©chou√©. La requ√™te a √©t√© interrompue.

Vous voyez ce message parce que ce site HTTPS exige que le navigateur web envoie un en-t√™te ¬´¬†Referer¬†¬ª, ce qu‚Äôil n'a pas fait. Cet en-t√™te est exig√© pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, afin de s‚Äôassurer que le navigateur n‚Äôait pas √©t√© pirat√© par un intervenant externe.

Si vous avez d√©sactiv√© l‚Äôenvoi des en-t√™tes ¬´¬†Referer¬†¬ª par votre navigateur, veuillez les r√©activer, au moins pour ce site ou pour les connexions HTTPS, ou encore pour les requ√™tes de m√™me origine (¬´¬†same-origin¬†¬ª).

Si vous utilisez la balise <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer"> ou que vous incluez l‚Äôen-t√™te ¬´ Referrer-Policy: no-referrer ¬ª, il est pr√©f√©rable de les enlever. La protection CSRF exige que l‚Äôen-t√™te ``Referer`` effectue un contr√¥le de r√©f√©rant strict. Si vous vous souciez de la confidentialit√©, utilisez des alternatives comme <a rel="noreferrer" ‚Ä¶> pour les liens vers des sites tiers.

Des informations plus d√©taill√©es sont affich√©es lorsque la variable DEBUG vaut True.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: mesads.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://mesads.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
